name: Persona 5: Visual Novel
description:
Alpha Demo v1.1: Released

Download & Install Instructions below ↓

  • MC's looks are (mostly) not specified + gender is neutral + name is changeable.
  • MC's basic personality changes depending on the arcana selected at the start of the game.
  • Contains mild swearing.
  • 2 romance targets: Kurusu Akira and Akechi Goro.
  • Unfinished stories as it's just a prototype; play at your own discretion.
  • [11 Apr] Fixed typo on Akechi's route ➜ Alpha v1.1
In the Works Recruiting Writers & Artists!
  • More stories.
  • More routes (if I can find interested writers for other routes).
  • 1 good ending for each routes.
  • There's a plan is to have a Secret Route unlocked upon completing certain endings.
Disclaimer
  • All assets included in the game demo and future releases are not mine, and credits to the asset owners / websites can be found under "Credits" page!
  • This is a fangame project made just for fun and I don't intend to actively make money from it. If you want to show your support for what I do, you can instead buy me a coffee!
  • Persona 5 franchise ⓒ Atlus
